thread.title: BRIEF-Staffing 360 Solutions Announces Refinancing Of UK Financing Facilities

title: BRIEF-Staffing 360 Solutions Announces Refinancing Of UK Financing Facilities

organizations.name: solutions announces refinancing of uk financing facilities

text:
February 12, 2018 / 8:08 AM / Updated 2 hours ago BRIEF-Staffing 360 Solutions Announces Refinancing Of UK Financing Facilities Reuters Staff 
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Staffing 360 Solutions Inc: 
* STAFFING 360 SOLUTIONS ANNOUNCES REFINANCING OF UK FINANCING FACILITIES 
* STAFFING 360 SOLUTIONS- SIGNED AGREEMENT TO ENTER AN INVOICE FINANCING FACILITY WITH HSBC INVOICE FINANCE UK TO COVER ITS 3 BUSINESS UNITS IN UKâ€‹ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
